Job__40.10__Behemoth: : In Hebrew, behema, which signifies in general an animal; but many authors explain, that here it is put for the elephant.
Job__40.14__He will apply his sword: : This text is variously explained: some explain the sword, the horn given to the animal for his defence: others, the power that God hath given to the animal for his defence: others, the power that God hath given to man to slay him, notwithstanding his great size and strength.
Job__40.20__Leviathan: : The whale or some sea monster.
